OOC: To be completely honest. I have every Bucky O' Hare figure and vehicle=
 ever made. (Blushes)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@cs=
.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2001 2:37 PM
=
  Subject: Shockwave & Unitron


  (Woohoo!  I've gotten post number 40038!=


  I have the Toad Borg action figure, he is most definately greater than =

  Complex or anyone else)

  Shockwave/Unitron:



  Shockwave boosted his=
 speed, out running all but a single shot, which blew a 
  part of his midd=
le fin off in the back of his space fighter form.  He didn't 
  curse, he d=
idn't yell in pain.  He simply got a target lock and fired two 
  missiles,=
 one at Forrior and the other at Cledar.

  ---

  Unitron was struck by al=
l the shots, the lasers not really doing anything 
  while the two missiles=
 put large dents in his turret.

  Aft, Unitron thought.  I have to keep mo=
ving or I won't last.

  The Decepticon powered up his motor and began goin=
g 30 MPH and climbing, but 
  wouldn't be able to go to his maximum of 60 M=
PH because of the missile 
  attacks.  His turret swerved slowly, firing of=
f two blasts of large lasers at 
  Hot Rod (he's a tank, no longer a space =
fighter).  His mounted machine gun on 
  his turret turned just as fast as =
it ever did, firing off ten rapid laser 
  bolts, all at Aerotaur.
